Job.Name: HubSpot and Google Calendar Integration
Job.Description:
Assemble will provide Experts to make website modifications as requested by the client, limited to the following: 1.) Create 2 Hubspot ""Schedule A Call"" Links and add to email signatures for CPG Farms and Assemble Email. 2.) Update ""Schedule a Call"" wording CTA on CPG's website to include the CPG Hubspot Schedule A Call Link created in Task 1. 3.) Update ""Let's do this"" button to ""Schedule a Meeting"" CTA with link to CPG Hubspot Schedule A Call Link created in Task 1. 4.) Setup CPG powered by Assemble forms and workflows and fully Integrate into Assemble Hubspot similar to Entrepreneur.
Does not include creation of media assets or paid media. Assumes research and needs assessment has been completed. Costs per line item are estimates. If updating a current CRM, assumes the service/ software is NOT out of date. NOTE: Email/ CRM optimization requires at least 3 months to see predictable results.

Task.Name: 30301 Adjust/ Optimize
Task.Description: Schedule Call links for Assemble and CPG Farms Hubspot/email accounts Link CPG farms Hubspot link to end of typeform Add schedule call links to respective email accounts (Assemble and CPG Farms) Change CTA button on website from "Let's do this" to "Book a Meeting" Change color if necessary Test link and handoff to client Create 3 forms and integrate into CPG Farms powered by Assemble Create 5 automated emails that trigger when lifecycle is lead to schedule meeting with Dean Setup automation to route CPG Farms Leads/MQLS/SQLs to Dean Route Typeform Assesment entries into contact record inside Assemble Hubspot Update CPG Farms powered by Assemble branding QA Forms, Workflows, etc and handoff to customer

Task.Name: 30001 Additional Work
Task.Description: Describe the additional work required to complete the Project
